text: I once had a girlfriend who loved that book. She liked it so much that it made me decide never to read it.

name: atticusonline
text: chubby for chuck

name: supahlovah
text:
One of the worst authors ever. Would not reccomend more than one book to any of my friends.

They're all the same. Nothing new in any of them.

name: dissembly
text:
I think he's a good *writer*. It's hard, though, to argue that it isn't misogynist, whiny white-boy-pain writing.

But i still think he's a good writer, in the sense of a "wordsmith." It's like CSI being honest with itself: kind of just a disgusting set of misogynist presumptions.

name: dismas
text: No one said that it couldn't be done.

text: Correctly.

name: raysdangnachos
text: No one said it could be done.

name: spinynorman
text: As a Texan, it is nice to see a cowboy's ass get served up cold once and again. Masculinity pales in the face of mindless, nihlistic violence.

name: atticusonline
text: THANK YOU!

name: zem
text: you're welcome

name: atticusonline
text:
You...I don't know you...

Get out of my assetbar!

text:
The GOF was the first story arc I read, and I too, thought it would be full of face-ripping.

it's not, but I wasn't too disappointed.

name: bazookaradio
text:
There is no better come back in this world than clean ripping a dude's face off all stone cold like.
5/5

name: paco
text: In a fight, yes. When a buddy makes a joke about your mom, ripping his face off might not be great.

name: doomchild
text:
Come on, I'm sure you can think of a joke that would require the immediate removal of all mandibilic musculature.

DC

name: joeynarcotic
text: Your mama's so fat, I ripped her face off during a honky-tonk-style blowjob. Slurp.

name: bookofsand
text: Your junk's gonna smell like Skoal or we're givin your money back; that's the Honky-Tonk-Style Blowjob Guarantee.

name: wehavemagnums
text: This is when Ray proves for the first time what he can really do, on his own. Truly he is the Son of Rodney.

name: catachresis
text: This strip still makes me want to puke every time I see it. Amazing.

name: senseihollywood
text: you and Ray both, it seems...(turns the page)

text: Haha, there are no pages! This is the internet .

name: gumfish
text: But... it's a page on the internet. Wait, what?

name: bixschmix
text:
The difference is, here we click . There, we turn .

This PSA brought to you by the Council for Technological Obsequiousness.

name: tekende
text: Obsequiousness? Did you learn that word at talk like a dick school?

name: bixschmix
text: Nerd school. We could take one class a semester at TLaDU for credit, but I was more focused on being a big ol' dork.

name: tellumo
text:
HE TORE HIS FACE OFF .

5/5 and a nomination for the Hall of Fame.

text: The alt text really made this strip funny for me rather than just plot development   violence

text: HOLY SHIT!

text: YES!

text: the dude has got no mercy

name: joeyramoney
text: he points too much.

name: aaron_haynes
text: I just realized that this comic is a callback to the first one with Envelope Martinez, where Ray was cheating his way into his reputation. Here, faced with a raw situation, he actually does remove the dude's face. This is where it became clear this storyline was going all the way, wherever that ended up being.

name: flipper_the_dolphin_bitch
text: Rad, I just noticed in panel 8, Ray's tail goes all fluffy, 'cause he's super pissed.

name: ttagxamm
text: Can I get a chubby here?  I'm fresh out, and the comment above needs one.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: done and done.

name: ntopp
text: And done.

text: So this is where ray proves that he can fight in his own right

text:
Face.

Off.

No more drugs for that man!

name: lawbot
text: I have generally found that a guaranteed honky-tonk style blowjob ordered from roomservice will be of low quality, like the in-room breakfast. Best to walk a block or so to somewhere specialist.

name: artifakt
text: Man, in the second to last err box (what do you call the boxes in the comic strip? do they have a name?!) the guy is just like "Wait, woah! Is this guy ACTUALLY ripping of my lower jaw or did I just have a little to much blood to drink?"

text: PANELS! Jeez. Well, not like it's something that's easy to Google ebay for.

text:
"Google ebay"

what

text: this

text: JESUS CHRIST!

text: DUDE IS RAW

name: terebikun
text: Wow. Shades of Riki-Oh ...

name: zeal
text: At first I thought this would be the point where Ray would fail, where his tough front of uber-macho complete self-confidence would shatter under the hardened fists of a cruel cowpoke.  But now, man.  But now.

name: fosters
text: The "guaranteed Honky Tonk style blowjob" bit is the greatest comeback I've ever heard.

name: ctrl_z
text: Oh my fucking god!

name: drago25
text:
RAY JUST RIPPED DUDES FACE OFF OMFG SO RAWWWW

too much coffee

name: andyfaewatford
text: FUCK! Ray just ripped a man's face clean off!

name: andyfaewatford
text: I mean, who would have thought he had it in him?

name: direhaggis
text: He may be wearing glasses, but you know Ray is just fixed in a bloodlust trance because of his eyebrows and the crease under his eyes. Dude had a genuine Incredible Hulk moment right there, right along with the self-disgust in the next panel.

name: pogo
text: Okay, I was lukewarm on this story arc, just reading along to pass the time, when POW! The Face Rip!!

name: jonmw
text: I like to imagine that Ray is just hovering in Panel 9.

name: ntopp
text: The alt-text alone garners a five.

name: goatmasterflash
text: this is an example of how the concept of onomatopoeia can become confusing. Surely the SSSIP of a martini and the RRRRIP of Cody Travis' lower face sound entirely different in action, yet they rhyme on paper.

name: dans
text: Guys, I think I know why you don't see Achewood in the newspaper

name: joeynarcotic
text: The strip where Ray Smuckles rips off Cody Travis's face may prove to be the greatest face removal of the modern era. More poetic than George Franju's Les Yeux Sans Visage, more startling than John Woo's Face/Off, more convincingly detailed than Jess Franco's Faceless, and more fucking RAW than a motherfucker.

name: furge
text:
You never, NEVER punch a man in a pork pie hat. EVER.

Or a cat in a pork pie hat either.

name: carlyle
text: You don't punch a fucking cat any which way.

name: fermatprime
text:
ray's sass is at its highest point in this arc.

this is why i love it

name: dipstikk
text: I was just thinking about how ironic it is that the square-jawed cowboy actually has a square jaw, and then Ray goes and tears it off. This comic, it hears me and answers.

name: xi
text: DAAAAAAAAA-AAAAAAAAAAAAA-AAAAAAAAAAAmn.

name: xi
text: DAMN.

name: sock
text: Ray's so rude, it's crazy! He is truly the So-Rodney.

name: lolsworth
text: There is no rating for this but 5. HE COLD RIPPED A DUDE'S FACE OFF. That is a 5. Any less should be a capital offence. You should be hauled up in The Hague just for giving this 4.

name: hallowedground
text: Easily one of the all-time great alt texts.

name: jacoiii
text: Best alt text.
